item.title: A Researcher Figured Out How to Reveal Any Phone Number Linked to a Google Account
item.description: Phone numbers are a goldmine for SIM swappers. A researcher found how to get this precious piece of information through a clever brute-force attack.

item.title: Typhur Dome 2 Review (2025): Fast and Bulbous
item.description: Typhur’s futuristic air fryer cooks faster, keeps perfect temperature, and can char chicken or bake a pizza. But it’ll cost you.

item.title: It’s Time to Kill Siri
item.description: After almost 10 years, Google Assistant was recently axed in favor of Gemini. Siri gets a bad rap—now is the time for Apple to make a change too.

item.title: 8 Best Gaming Laptops (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested the latest and greatest gaming laptops—from portable machines to an 18-inch monster—so you can level up your game anywhere.

item.title: I Joined Every Class Action Lawsuit I Could Find, and So Can You
item.description: More Americans than ever are becoming eligible for a class action payout—but the money is going to a small, dedicated group of people who are paying a...
